verses.text: \w Therefore|strong="G5124"\w* \w seeing|strong="G1223"\w* we \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w ministry|strong="G1248"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* we have received \w mercy|strong="G1653"\w*, we \w faint|strong="G1573"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*;

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* have \w renounced|strong="G0550"\w* the hidden \w things|strong="G2927"\w* of \w dishonesty|strong="G0152"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w walking|strong="G4043"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w craftiness|strong="G3834"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3366"\w* \w handling|strong="G1389"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w deceitfully|strong="G1389"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* by \w manifestation|strong="G5321"\w* of the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w* \w commending|strong="G4921"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w man’s|strong="G0444"\w* \w conscience|strong="G4893"\w* in the sight \w of|strong="G1799"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* be \w hid|strong="G2572"\w*, it \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w hid|strong="G2572"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that \w are|strong="G2076"\w* \w lost|strong="G0622"\w*:

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* the \w god|strong="G2316"\w* of \w this|strong="G5127"\w* \w world|strong="G0165"\w* hath \w blinded|strong="G5186"\w* the \w minds|strong="G3540"\w* of them which believe \w not|strong="G0571"\w*, \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* the \w light|strong="G5462"\w* of the \w glorious|strong="G1391"\w* \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w image|strong="G1504"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, should \w shine|strong="G0826"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* we \w preach|strong="G2784"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w servants|strong="G1401"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w Jesus’ sake|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w commanded|strong="G2036"\w* the \w light|strong="G5457"\w* to \w shine|strong="G2989"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w darkness|strong="G4655"\w*, hath \w shined|strong="G2989"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*, \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \add give\add* the \w light|strong="G5462"\w* of the \w knowledge|strong="G1108"\w* of the \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w face|strong="G4383"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* we \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w this|strong="G5126"\w* \w treasure|strong="G2344"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w earthen|strong="G3749"\w* \w vessels|strong="G4632"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* the \w excellency|strong="G5236"\w* of the \w power|strong="G1411"\w* may \w be|strong="G5600"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*.

\add We are\add* \w troubled|strong="G2346"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* every \w side|strong="G3956"\w*, \w yet|strong="G0235"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w distressed|strong="G4729"\w*; \add we are\add* \w perplexed|strong="G0639"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* in \w despair|strong="G1820"\w*;

\w Persecuted|strong="G1377"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w forsaken|strong="G1459"\w*; cast \w down|strong="G2598"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w destroyed|strong="G0622"\w*;

\w Always|strong="G3842"\w* bearing \w about|strong="G4064"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w body|strong="G4983"\w* the \w dying|strong="G3500"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* the \w life|strong="G2222"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* might be made \w manifest|strong="G5319"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* which \w live|strong="G2198"\w* are \w alway|strong="G0104"\w* \w delivered|strong="G3860"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w Jesus’ sake|strong="G2424"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* the \w life|strong="G2222"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* might be made \w manifest|strong="G5319"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w mortal|strong="G2349"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*.

So \w then|strong="G5620"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w* \w worketh|strong="G1754"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*.

\w We|strong="G2249"\w* \w having|strong="G2192"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, according \w as|strong="G2596"\w* it is \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, I \w believed|strong="G4100"\w*, and \w therefore|strong="G1352"\w* have I \w spoken|strong="G2980"\w*; \w we|strong="G4100"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w therefore|strong="G1352"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w*;

\w Knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he \w which|strong="G3588"\w* raised \w up|strong="G1453"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* shall raise \w up|strong="G1453"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* shall \w present|strong="G3936"\w* \add us\add* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \add are\add* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* your \w sakes|strong="G5209"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* the \w abundant|strong="G4121"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w might|strong="G4052"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* the \w thanksgiving|strong="G2169"\w* of \w many|strong="G4119"\w* \w redound|strong="G4052"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

For which \w cause|strong="G1352"\w* we \w faint|strong="G1573"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w though|strong="G1487"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w outward|strong="G1854"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w perish|strong="G1311"\w*, \w yet|strong="G0235"\w* the \w inward|strong="G2081"\w* \add man\add* is \w renewed|strong="G0341"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w by|strong="G2532"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w light|strong="G1645"\w* \w affliction|strong="G2347"\w*, which is but for a \w moment|strong="G3910"\w*, \w worketh|strong="G2716"\w* for \w us|strong="G2254"\w* a \w far|strong="G5236"\w* more \w exceeding|strong="G5236"\w* \add and\add* \w eternal|strong="G0166"\w* \w weight|strong="G0922"\w* of \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*;

While \w we|strong="G2257"\w* \w look|strong="G4648"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* at the \w things|strong="G3588"\w* which are \w seen|strong="G0991"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* at the \w things|strong="G3588"\w* which \w are|strong="G0991"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w seen|strong="G0991"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* the \w things|strong="G3588"\w* which are \w seen|strong="G0991"\w* \add are\add* \w temporal|strong="G4340"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* the \w things|strong="G3588"\w* which \w are|strong="G0991"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w seen|strong="G0991"\w* \add are\add* \w eternal|strong="G0166"\w*.
